Issue.creator: ratnakar
Issue.summary: Java chaincode build fails on Fabric V0.6 branch
Issue.description: Could not find org.hyperledger:shim-client:1.0. Searched in the following locations: file:/home/vagrant/.m2/repository/org/hyperledger/shim-client/1.0/shim-client-1.0.pom file:/home/vagrant/.m2/repository/org/hyperledger/shim-client/1.0/shim-client-1.0.jar https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/hyperledger/shim-client/1.0/shim-client-1.0.pom https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/hyperledger/shim-client/1.0/shim-client-1.0.jar Required by: fabric.examples.chaincode.java:SimpleSample:unspecified * Try: Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace.
